CustomField.formula: LPAD(TEXT(DAY( DateofHouseBLIssued__c )),2,'0') +'-'+ CASE( MONTH( DateofHouseBLIssued__c ) , 1, "JAN", 2, "FEB", 3, "MAR", 4, "APR", 5, "MAY", 6, "JUN", 7, "JUL", 8, "AUG", 9, "SEP", 10, "OCT", 11, "NOV", "DEC") +'-'+ TEXT(YEAR( DateofHouseBLIssued__c ))
CustomField.label: Date Issued (HBL)
